comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: CI isn't passing. Looks like it's missing a submodule update of monad, which should wait until #506 is merged.

comments.author: palladia
comments.body: Yes, please merge [#14](https://github.com/PowerShell/psl-monad/pull/14) from PSL-Monad branch first.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @palladia I can't, I need to see passing CI here first. Commit the submodule update, have CI pass, we'll approve and merge monad, and then do the same here.
